Spaghetti
Shawarma
Chicken Nugget
Fish And Chips7
Hamburger
Scotch Eggs
Sandwiches
Pizza

string-array.name: desc
string-array.item: Spaghetti is a long, thin, cylindrical, solid pasta.It is a staple food of traditional Italian cuisine made of milled wheat and water.
Shawarma is a Levantine meat preparation, where lamb, chicken, turkey, beef, veal, or mixed meats are placed on a spit, and may be grilled.
Chicken Nugget is a chicken product made from chicken meat which is breaded or battered, then deep-fried or baked.
Fish And Chips is a hot dish of English origin consisting of fried battered fish and hot potato chips.
Hamburger is a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked patties of ground meat placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.
Scotch Eggs is a hard-boiled egg wrapped in sausage meat, coated in bread crumbs and baked or deep-fried.
Sandwiches is a food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread.
Pizza a yeasted flatbread typically topped with tomato sauce and cheese and baked in an oven.
